name: BotCombat
description:
This is demo version of a future game I am developing dealing with robots in a battle arena.

For the moment it contains just one scene with two robots on a chess board in space. You can control manually one robot while the other is totally inert for the moment.

Keyboard Controls:

  • Arrows UP/DOWN: Forward/Backward movement; LEFT/RIGHT: Rotate.
  • F : Activate/Desactivate shield
  • G : Activate/Desactivate lance
  • H : Virtual hit which decreases the top-left energy bar
  • J : Virtual energy gain which increases the top-left energy bar
  • K : Kill the bot with an explosion (you then need to reload the page to play again)
  • L : Activate/Desactivate laser
  • M : Fire the cannon gun
  • Space bar : Jump (ground checking system not yet implemented)

Mouse Control : Zoom in/out with Mouse wheel
